translation: Whatever fruit of merit is declared (in the scriptures) to accrue from (the study of) the Vedas, (the performance of) sacrifices, (the practice of) austerities, and gifts, beyond all this goes the Yogi, having known this; and he attains to the Supreme, Primeval (first or ancient) Abode.
commentary: 8.28 in the Vedas? in sacrifices in sacrifices? in austerities in austerities? f and? Eve also? in gifts in gifts? That whatever? Punyaphalam fruit of merit? Pradishtam is declared? Atyeti goes beyond? That that? Everything all? This is this? knowing having known? Yogi the Yogi? The next Supreme? Location abode? Upaiti attains? f and? Adyam primeval (first? ancient).Commentary The glory of Yoga is described in this verse.
